Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me and I believe it would be equally valuable to you. Considering its worth to both parties, I propose a transaction price of $1,300,000. This amount reflects a fair compromise between its intrinsic value and your perceived worth, aiming to ensure a mutually beneficial outcome. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies all aspects of this transaction. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,300,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,300,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
